pr_title: [ML] mark forecasts for force closed/failed jobs as failed

timeline.message: [ML] mark forecasts for force closed/failed jobs as failed

timeline.bodyText: There is a string array field called forecast_messages which can be used to add a reason for the failure.
timeline.author: hendrikmuhs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1272,6 +1276,39 @@ public void scheduledEvents(ScheduledEventsQueryBuilder query, ActionListener<Qu
                 client::search);
     }
 
+    public void setRunningForecastsToFailed(String jobId, ActionListener<Boolean> listener) {
+        QueryBuilder forecastQuery = QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
+            .filter(QueryBuilders.termQuery(Result.RESULT_TYPE.getPreferredName(), ForecastRequestStats.RESULT_TYPE_VALUE))
+            .filter(QueryBuilders.termQuery(Job.ID.getPreferredName(), jobId))
+            .filter(QueryBuilders.termsQuery(ForecastRequestStats.STATUS.getPreferredName(),
+                ForecastRequestStats.ForecastRequestStatus.SCHEDULED.toString(),
+                ForecastRequestStats.ForecastRequestStatus.STARTED.toString()));
+
+        UpdateByQueryRequest request = new UpdateByQueryRequest(AnomalyDetectorsIndex.resultsWriteAlias(jobId))
+            .setQuery(forecastQuery)
+            .setIndicesOptions(IndicesOptions.lenientExpandOpen())
+            .setAbortOnVersionConflict(false)
+            .setMaxRetries(3)
+            .setRefresh(true)
+            .setScript(new Script("ctx._source.forecast_status='failed'"));

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't sendRemoveRequest async? What if other results are still in the results queue and overwrite the failure state again?
I wonder if it would be better to do this in AutodetectCommunicator::killProcess?
timeline.author: hendrikmuhs

replies.bodyText:
🤔 Good point.
But, awaitCompletion is false when the task is cancelled. We might could throw a hook in results processor somewhere (AutodetectResultProcessor). if the process is killed, make sure to set all running forecasts to failed.
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: I added a commit doing exactly this. Going to update tests, etc.. changing PR to draft while I iron out the wrinkles.
replies.author: benwtrent

timeline.message: attempting to move forecast clean up in message processor

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice if we could reuse here JobResultsProvider.setRunningForecastsToFailed. The benefits would be that we don't need a copy constructor for ForecastRequestStats which is prone for bugs (forgetting to add a new field there), and we don't need to keep track of open forecasts here in the new runningForecasts member.
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou

replies.bodyText: setRunningForecastsToFailed is a DBQ. It is possible to have a forecast request stat document persisted without the index refreshing since. So, the DBQ would not find it.
replies.author: benwtrent
